text:
Very convenient place since they operate 24 hrs. However, their fruits sometimes are not fresh and some are already near rotten. Also, they often forgot to program some items (e.g. fresh Milk) where there are suppose to have discount if you buy 2 items, end up, consumers has to pay much more for no reason. I used to pay extra $1 for 2 bottles of milk that suppose to have discount, but due to their programming fault. Today, it happened again, and I refused to buy.
I hope their management could look into this matter.

The aircom is out of service for about 2 months ald but seems like the management not taking any actions on it . Went in & feeling super hot . Doesn’t feel comfortable to stay inside . I fast fast grab some of the needs then come out ald cz it’s ridiculously hot . Think this will affect the business if the aircom continue to be like this
This is a good place for picking up groceries after midnight - it has varieties of product to offer at a reasonably good price. Parking by road side is convenient too.

Friendly staff, quickly replenished.  24 hours and ultra convenient. you'll find most things, fresh fruit, vegetables, snacks, instant drinks, baby formula and cleaning essentials, even party stuff like aluminium foil and basic bbq accessories. cigarettes available here too.

lady with the short hair wearing glass is very rude and looks likes don't know anything about any products in the place she working in while she's been here quite long time.
worst service
